creator: Discovery Bank Ltd
descriptionHtml:
10 reasons why you’ll love banking with us:

1) We're a bank that gets behind you
Our main goal is to improve your financial health. We’ll help you change how you work with your money by guiding, motivating and rewarding you for getting financially healthier.

2) Vitality Money improves your financial health
Through Vitality Money, you'll learn more about what it means to be financially healthy. You can track your progress on our app and enjoy rewards as you get financially healthier.

3) Get rewarded with Dynamic Interest Rates
By improving your Vitality Money status, you’re in control of your Dynamic Interest Rates. By banking healthier, you’ll get better interest rates on savings and lower interest on credit.

4) Boost your Vitality rewards
With Vitality Money, you get even more rewards from Vitality partners like up to 100% cash back on your gym membership, up to 75% off flights, up to 75% cash back on HealthyFood, and more!

5) Vitality Active Rewards
Meet your money goals and earn weekly rewards like coffee, smoothies or shopping vouchers, and more. You can also choose to save your rewards as cash in your Vitality Savings Account.

6) Your branch is in the palm of your hand
Our banking app has hundreds of features. You can sign up in minutes with a selfie and without any paperwork. Control how you see your accounts and transactions and add new accounts and cards with just a few taps.

7) Pay anyone quickly, easily and safely
Pay using just a cellphone number or make instant payments in seconds; linking your Discovery Health Medical Scheme to your account so you can settle medical co-payments instantly at Dis-Chem or Clicks; and tap-and-go payments with Fitbit, Garmin and Samsung Pay.

8) Manage your money better as a family
Bank as a family and manage your money better, together. Add members to your account in seconds, share your credit, and work towards your financial goals together. And everyone gets to share in the rewards too.

9) You get one bank account that does it all
Enjoy smart and efficient banking with the Discovery 1 Account. Get a state-of-the-art credit card that you can also use for your bank account – with one interest rate and one fee. Plus, all your cash backs and discounts will be paid into a built-in Vitality Savings Account.

10) Get more value with the Discovery products you have
If you’re already part of the Discovery family, your bank account will give you even more value with:
• Boosted Vitality rewards
• Seamless medical-co-payments
• Immediate 48-hour short-term insurance cover
• Discounted life insurance
• Enhanced investment returns.

How to Join Discovery Bank
• Download the Discovery Bank app and tap Join the Bank to register
• Verify your cellphone number and register with your selfie
• Confirm your details, build your account and accept your offer
• Finish your application, choose where to deliver your card and set up your accounts
• Customise your banking, add more accounts, secondary cards and family members in minutes.
• Unlock rewards with Vitality Money and Vitality Active Rewards

Discovery Bank Limited. Registration number 2015/408745/06. An authorised financial services and registered credit provider. FSP number 48657. NCR registration number NCRCP9997.

By downloading the Discovery Bank app you give consent to Discovery Bank to contact you.
Terms and conditions apply.
descriptionShort: Join the world’s first behavioural bank and get financially healthier.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
You can now see a full list of public beneficiaries available for payment. Simply select the More menu to view your beneficiaries list and then tap on the kebab icon within ‘public beneficiaries’ to see this new feature.
You can now simplify paying your credit card account by setting up a monthly debit order in a few easy steps.
General bug fixes and updates.

6.Vitality Active Rewards

Meet your money goals and earn weekly rewards like Discovery Miles, coffee, smoothies or shopping vouchers, and more.

7. Get a new iPhone on us

Want to upgrade your phone? Upgrade your bank. Achieve all your Vitality Active Rewards goals over 24 months to fully fund a new iPhone.

8.Your branch is in the palm of your hand

10.Manage your money better as a family (coming soon)

Bank as a family and manage your money better, together. You can add family members to your account with just a few taps, share your credit and unlock exclusive rewards as well as discounted account fees.
11.We’ve got the perfect behavioural account for you

Enjoy smart, efficient banking with the new Discovery Card that has built-in transactional capabilities or choose the full banking suite for the best value and comprehensive benefits. We also offer a range of transaction accounts for your day-to-day banking and savings accounts to help you reach your savings goals.
12.Get more value with the Discovery products you have
If you’re already part of the Discovery family, your bank account will give you even more value with:

- Discounted life insurance
- Enhanced investment returns.
How to Join Discovery Bank:

Download the Discovery Bank app and enter your details to see if you can join us today. If we’ve reached our limit, we’ll reserve your spot and let you know when it’s your time to get on board!

• Download the Discovery Bank app and tap ‘Join the Bank’
• Verify your cellphone number and register with your selfie
• Confirm your details, build your account and accept your offer
• Finish your application, choose where to deliver your card and set up your accounts
• Customise your banking, add more accounts, secondary cards and family members in minutes.
• Unlock rewards with Vitality Money and Vitality Active Rewards

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New in-app Card functionality

We have enhanced the card functionality to enable you to view the full card number and CVV. This enables you to buy goods online easily without having to refer to your physical card.

If these e-commerce transactions are performed on your mobile, you can also copy your full card number to the clipboard and paste it into the app or web page, which would make paying with your Discovery Card quicker and easier.

title: Discovery Bank

creator: Discovery Bank Ltd
descriptionHtml:
What makes banking with us different? We’re the world’s first fully digital, behavioural bank. Sign up in as little as 5 minutes anytime, anywhere and have your bank branch in the palm of your hand.

Discovery Bank offers market-leading interest rates, revolutionary digital payment methods and a banking experience that makes life easier, more exciting and of course, more rewarding.

Here are just some of the features our app has to offer:

Your bank at your fingertips:
o Sign up with our advanced facial recognition technology and paperless verification process in as little as five minutes.
o Bank safely with our advanced security and conveniently manage and track your cards, accounts and rewards all in one place. You’ll be able to instantly change a PIN, remotely pause or stop your cards, and do much, much more.
o Get real-time alerts so you always know what’s happening with your accounts.
o Buy prepaid products such as airtime, data, SMS bundles, water and electricity and get 15% off when you pay using Discovery Miles.
o View and download your bank statements, account letters, tax and deposit certificates whenever you need them.

Pay anyone quickly, safely and easily:
o Make low-cost real-time payments. Plus, you’ll be able to pay Discovery clients just using their cellphone number with Discovery Pay.
o Set up Health Banking to instantly pay remaining medical expenses at select pharmacies, hospital and medical service providers.
o Tap and pay on the go with Fitbit Pay, Garmin Pay and Samsung Pay.

Get financially heathier with Vitality Money:

We all want to be financially healthier. Now, you can join the bank that shows you how, helps you get there and rewards you along the way.
o Understand and track your financial health while unlocking incredible rewards.
o Reach your goals by engaging with your five key financial behaviours to reach a higher Vitality Money status.
o Get rewarded on your healthy grocery shopping, personal care, fitness devices, sports gear and equipment, and so much more!
o You can even boost the interest you earn on your demand savings and transaction accounts by up to 1.5% more and pay up to 6.75% less on your credit with our Dynamic Interest Rates.

Earn Discovery Miles – a rewards currency like no other
o Earn Discovery Miles from Vitality rewards, swiping your cards, reaching your weekly Vitality Active Rewards goals, and more.
o Spend them how you want. Shop in-store and online, convert them into partner travel rewards, use them to pay a contact, or exchange them for cash.
o View, manage and pay with your Discovery Miles Account in the banking app.

Let us help you pay for a brand-new iPhone
o Achieve all your weekly Vitality Active Rewards goals and we’ll help you cover the cost of a new iPhone.

Reach your savings goals faster:
o Open a free savings account and earn marketing-leading interest rates. Reach your savings goals faster with our Dynamic Interest Rates.

Don’t just take our word for it:
• 5/5
"Wow! Digital Banking at its best!" - Albert J
• 5/5
“I had to install the Discovery Bank App and it was the easiest application I have ever completed. Everything was done (uploads of Proof of Address, Payslips etc.) on the app and it was very user friendly. I am really very impressed.” – David S
• Best Bank with great benefits
“Since I have joined Discovery Bank, I have been totally satisfied. Everything they promised is what they deliver.” – Marilyn N
descriptionShort: The world’s first behavioural bank is here to reward you for banking well.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: New Vitality Money User Experience and Smart Search functionality along with performance improvements.

title: Discovery Bank

creator: Discovery Bank Ltd
descriptionHtml:
What makes banking with us different? We’re the world’s first fully digital, behavioural bank. Sign up in as little as 5 minutes anytime, anywhere and have your bank branch in the palm of your hand.

Discovery Bank offers market-leading interest rates, revolutionary digital payment methods and a banking experience that makes life easier, more exciting and of course, more rewarding.

Here are just some of the features our app has to offer:

Your bank at your fingertips:
o Sign up with our advanced facial recognition technology and paperless verification process in as little as five minutes.
o Bank safely with our advanced security and conveniently manage and track your cards, accounts and rewards all in one place. You’ll be able to instantly change a PIN, remotely pause or stop your cards, and do much, much more.
o Get real-time alerts so you always know what’s happening with your accounts.
o Buy prepaid products such as airtime, data, SMS bundles, water and electricity and get 15% off when you pay using Discovery Miles.
o View and download your bank statements, account letters, tax and deposit certificates whenever you need them.

Pay anyone quickly, safely and easily:
o Make low-cost real-time payments. Plus, you’ll be able to pay Discovery clients just using their cellphone number with Discovery Pay.
o Set up Health Banking to instantly pay remaining medical expenses at select pharmacies, hospital and medical service providers.
o Tap and pay on the go with Fitbit Pay, Garmin Pay and Samsung Pay.

Get financially heathier with Vitality Money:

We all want to be financially healthier. Now, you can join the bank that shows you how, helps you get there and rewards you along the way.
o Understand and track your financial health while unlocking incredible rewards.
o Reach your goals by engaging with your five key financial behaviours to reach a higher Vitality Money status.
o Get rewarded on your healthy grocery shopping, personal care, fitness devices, sports gear and equipment, and so much more!
o You can even boost the interest you earn on your demand savings and transaction accounts by up to 1.5% more and pay up to 6.75% less on your credit with our Dynamic Interest Rates.

Earn Discovery Miles – a rewards currency like no other
o Earn Discovery Miles from Vitality rewards, swiping your cards, reaching your weekly Vitality Active Rewards goals, and more.
o Spend them how you want. Shop in-store and online, convert them into partner travel rewards, use them to pay a contact, or exchange them for cash.
o View, manage and pay with your Discovery Miles Account in the banking app.

Let us help you pay for a brand-new iPhone
o Achieve all your weekly Vitality Active Rewards goals and we’ll help you cover the cost of a new iPhone.

Reach your savings goals faster:
o Open a free savings account and earn marketing-leading interest rates. Reach your savings goals faster with our Dynamic Interest Rates.

title: Discovery Bank

creator: Discovery Bank Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the future of Banking. We’re the world’s first fully digital shared-value bank. Sign up in under 5 minutes anytime, anywhere and have your bank branch in the palm of your hand.

Discovery Bank offers market-leading interest rates, revolutionized digital payments and a banking experience that makes life easier, more exciting and of course, more rewarding.

Here are just some of the features our app has to offer:

Your bank at your fingertips:

o Sign up in under five minutes and get access to your free virtual card to begin transacting immediately.
o Get fast, easy access to credit when you need it most.
o Bank safely and conveniently: Manage and track your cards, accounts and rewards all in one place. Instantly change a PIN, and securely pause or stop your cards.
o Get alerts so you always know what’s happening with your accounts.
o Buy prepaid products such as airtime, data, SMS bundles, water and electricity and get up to 20% off when you pay using Discovery Miles.
o View and download your bank statements, account confirmation letters, and tax and deposit certificates whenever you need them.

Pay anyone quickly, safely and easily:

o Apple Pay is here. Enjoy a safer, more convenient way to pay.
o Make payments to any of your cellphone contacts who are Discovery clients, regardless of who they bank with Discovery Pay.
o Enjoy safer, convenient payments and shopping with our virtual card. Shop online or use it to tap-and-pay in store with Fitbit Pay, Garmin Pay and Samsung Pay.
o Set up Health Pay to pay your medical expenses at pharmacies, hospital and medical service providers.

Get exclusive access to Vitality Money:

We all want to be financially healthier. Imagine a bank that shows you how and helps you get there, while rewarding you along the way.

o Understand and track your financial health while unlocking incredible rewards.
o Reach your goals by engaging with your five key financial behaviours to reach a higher Vitality Money status.
o Get rewarded on your healthy grocery shopping, personal care, fitness devices, sports gear and equipment, and so much more!
o With Dynamic Interest Rates you can even boost your interest earned by an extra up to 1.5% on your demand savings and cheque accounts and pay up to 6.75% less on your credit.

Earn Discovery Miles, a rewards currency like no other:

- Earn Discovery Miles – our rewards currency more valuable than cash - when you exercise, drive well or spend your money responsibly rewards currency that’s more valuable than cash.
- Save up to 20% when you spend them in-store and online, or convert them into travel rewards, use them to pay a contact or convert them to cash.
o View, manage and pay using your Discovery Miles Account in your banking app.

Get a new iPhone on us:
o Fund a new iPhone when achieving your weekly Vitality Active Rewards goals.

Reach your savings goals faster:
o Reach your savings goals faster! Open free savings accounts and earn market-leading interest rates.
descriptionShort: Discovery Bank is a shared-value bank. The Future of Banking. Now.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We've added a number of ‘how-to’ videos to guide our clients.  We've added the ability to use an iStore Gift Card as a part-payment when signing up for the iPhone Benefit.  You can now upload and store images of your receipts in your transaction list for warranty claims, returns or insurance purposes. You can also change the transaction description and add notes to a transaction.  These transactions can easily be found at a later date by searching for this personalised data in Smart Search.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This release includes the following enhancements:
• We have improved our cross-border forex payments.
• You can now add a secondary multi-currency debit card.
• We have enhanced our notification functionality.
• The total pending transaction amount is now visible on the account tile.
• We’ve added automation of bank statement retrieval for income verification.

Discovery Bank offers market-leading interest rates, revolutionized digital payments and a banking experience that makes life easier, more exciting and of course, more rewarding.

Here are just some of the features our app has to offer:

Your bank at your fingertips:

o Sign up in under five minutes and get access to your free virtual card to begin transacting immediately.
o Get fast, easy access to credit when you need it most.
o Bank safely and conveniently: Manage and track your cards, accounts and rewards all in one place. Instantly change a PIN, and securely pause or stop your cards.
o Get alerts so you always know what’s happening with your accounts.
o Buy prepaid products such as airtime, data, SMS bundles, water and electricity and get up to 20% off when you pay using Discovery Miles.
o View and download your bank statements, account confirmation letters, and tax and deposit certificates whenever you need them.

Pay anyone quickly, safely and easily:

o Apple Pay is here. Enjoy a safer, more convenient way to pay.
o Make payments to any of your cellphone contacts who are Discovery clients, regardless of who they bank with Discovery Pay.
o Enjoy safer, convenient payments and shopping with our virtual card. Shop online or use it to tap-and-pay in store with Fitbit Pay, Garmin Pay and Samsung Pay.
o Set up Health Pay to pay your medical expenses at pharmacies, hospital and medical service providers.

Get exclusive access to Vitality Money:

We all want to be financially healthier. Imagine a bank that shows you how and helps you get there, while rewarding you along the way.

o Understand and track your financial health while unlocking incredible rewards.
o Reach your goals by engaging with your five key financial behaviours to reach a higher Vitality Money status.
o Get rewarded on your healthy grocery shopping, personal care, fitness devices, sports gear and equipment, and so much more!
o With Dynamic Interest Rates you can even boost your interest earned by an extra up to 1.5% on your demand savings and cheque accounts and pay up to 6.75% less on your credit.

Earn Discovery Miles, a rewards currency like no other:

- Earn Discovery Miles – our rewards currency more valuable than cash - when you exercise, drive well or spend your money responsibly rewards currency that’s more valuable than cash.
- Save up to 20% when you spend them in-store and online, or convert them into travel rewards, use them to pay a contact or convert them to cash.
o View, manage and pay using your Discovery Miles Account in your banking app.

Get a new iPhone on us:
o Fund a new iPhone when achieving your weekly Vitality Active Rewards goals.

Reach your savings goals faster:
o Reach your savings goals faster! Open free savings accounts and earn market-leading interest rates.
descriptionShort: Discovery Bank is a shared-value bank. The Future of Banking. Now.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Various enhancements.

title: Discovery Bank

creator: Discovery Bank Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the future of Banking. We’re the world’s first fully digital shared-value bank. Sign up in under 5 minutes anytime, anywhere and have your bank branch in the palm of your hand.

Discovery Bank offers market-leading interest rates, revolutionized digital payments and a banking experience that makes life easier, more exciting and of course, more rewarding.

Here are just some of the features our app has to offer:

Your bank at your fingertips:

o Sign up in under five minutes and get access to your free virtual card to begin transacting immediately.
o Get fast, easy access to credit when you need it most.
o Bank safely and conveniently: Manage and track your cards, accounts and rewards all in one place. Instantly change a PIN, and securely pause or stop your cards.
o Get alerts so you always know what’s happening with your accounts.
o Buy prepaid products such as airtime, data, SMS bundles, water and electricity and get up to 20% off when you pay using Discovery Miles.
o View and download your bank statements, account confirmation letters, and tax and deposit certificates whenever you need them.

Pay anyone quickly, safely and easily:

o Apple Pay is here. Enjoy a safer, more convenient way to pay.
o Make payments to any of your cellphone contacts who are Discovery clients, regardless of who they bank with Discovery Pay.
o Enjoy safer, convenient payments and shopping with our virtual card. Shop online or use it to tap-and-pay in store with Fitbit Pay, Garmin Pay and Samsung Pay.
o Set up Health Pay to pay your medical expenses at pharmacies, hospital and medical service providers.

Get exclusive access to Vitality Money:

We all want to be financially healthier. Imagine a bank that shows you how and helps you get there, while rewarding you along the way.

o Understand and track your financial health while unlocking incredible rewards.
o Reach your goals by engaging with your five key financial behaviours to reach a higher Vitality Money status.
o Get rewarded on your healthy grocery shopping, personal care, fitness devices, sports gear and equipment, and so much more!
o With Dynamic Interest Rates you can even boost your interest earned by an extra up to 1.5% on your demand savings and cheque accounts and pay up to 6.75% less on your credit.

Earn Discovery Miles, a rewards currency like no other:

- Earn Discovery Miles – our rewards currency more valuable than cash - when you exercise, drive well or spend your money responsibly rewards currency that’s more valuable than cash.
- Save up to 20% when you spend them in-store and online, or convert them into travel rewards, use them to pay a contact or convert them to cash.
o View, manage and pay using your Discovery Miles Account in your banking app.

Get a new iPhone on us:
o Fund a new iPhone when achieving your weekly Vitality Active Rewards goals.

Reach your savings goals faster:
o Reach your savings goals faster! Open free savings accounts and earn market-leading interest rates.
descriptionShort: Discovery Bank is a shared-value bank. The Future of Banking. Now.

descriptionHtml:

o View and download your bank statements, account confirmation letters, and tax and deposit certificates whenever you need them.

Pay anyone quickly, safely and easily:

o Apple Pay is here. Enjoy a safer, more convenient way to pay.

title:
Discovery Bank
5.9.0

creator: Discovery Bank Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Discovery Bank is the next generation in digital banking. The Future of Banking. Now.

Welcome to the world’s first fully digital shared-value bank. Sign up in under 5 minutes anytime, anywhere and have a bank branch in the palm of your hand.

Discovery Bank offers some of the best interest rates in the market, revolutionised digital payments and SA’s best client experience that makes life easier, more exciting, and more rewarding. Unlock a world of rewards with Discovery Miles – the rewards currency worth up to 30% more than cash - and access Vitality Travel and get up to 75% off local and international flights.

A full bank branch at your fingertips:
o Sign up in under 5 minutes, get a free virtual card and start transacting immediately.
o Manage your cards, accounts, and rewards in one place.
o Instantly change a PIN, and pause or stop cards.
o Manage in-app and email notifications so you’re always in the know.
o Download certified bank statements, account confirmation letters, and tax and deposit certificates anytime.
o Get client support 24/7/365.

Pay anyone, anywhere, anytime:
o Real-time payments from only R1.
o Make instant payments to your Discovery client contacts without banking details with Discovery Pay.
o Generate virtual cards in seconds for safer, more convenient, and more rewarding payments.
o Tap-and-pay with Apple Pay, Fitbit Pay, Garmin Pay, Google Pay, Samsung Pay and SwatchPAY!.
o Skip queues and automatically settle medical expenses at pharmacies, hospitals, and medical service providers with Health Pay.

Access products that enrich your life:
o Get exclusive access to Vitality Money, which helps you track and improve your financial behaviours and rewards you when you do.
o Choose an account right for you – from day-to-day banking, a credit card, or full banking suite.
o Open unlimited free savings accounts in minutes and earn market-leading interest rates.
o Get credit of up to R1,000,000 with immediate access when you need it.
o Apply for a home loan on the app, get up to 100% financing and a preliminary offer in 5 minutes.
o Open British Pound, Euro and US Dollar Forex accounts in minutes for seamless foreign currency transactions anywhere in the world.

Upgrade your travel experience with Vitality Travel:
o Enjoy an enhanced travel experience with Vitality Travel by Discovery Bank.
o Get up to 75% off local and international flights.
o Use the Discovery Bank app to browse local and international flights by airline, cabin class, fare type, stops and times.
o Pay seamlessly from your cards and accounts, or with Discovery Miles.
o Get exclusive access to The Lounge, by Discovery Bank and SAA, for an elevated pre-flight experience.
o Skip the queues at security clearance and car hire with Priority Fast Track and Europcar Ready2GO.

Unlock a world of rewards:
o Up to 75% off local and international flights
o Up to 75% back on HealthyFood items at Checkers and Woolworths
o Up to 50% back on HealthyCare items at Clicks and Dis-Chem
o Up to 20% back on fuel spend at bp and select Shell stations
o Up to 20% back on Uber rides

Earn and spend Discovery Miles:
o Earn Discovery Miles every time you use your Discovery bank virtual card.
o Earn Discovery Miles through Vitality Active Rewards (when you exercise, drive well, or spend responsibly), and for Vitality lifestyle rewards (like up to 75% back in Discovery Miles when buying HealthyFood items).
o Use Discovery Miles to pay and save up to 15% when you spend them in-store and online every day – this doubles to up to 30% off on Miles D-Day on the 15th of every month.
o Buy prepaid products like airtime, data, SMS bundles, water and electricity and get up to 15% off.
o Buy entertainment vouchers for Blu Voucher, PlayStation Store, Roblox, Spotify and more – with up to 15% off select vouchers.
o You can also use Discovery Miles to pay for travel, send them to your contacts or convert them to cash.
descriptionShort: Discovery Bank is a shared-value bank. The Future of Banking. Now.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: You can now view historical payments to a beneficiary within the beneficiary payment flow.
